name: Student
text: Staying warm? The Engineering Mall looks beautiful with all the lights. Have you seen it at night?

name: You
text: I walked by last night, and it was stunning! Do they do this every year?

name: Student
text: Yes, they light it up every winter. It’s worth checking out a few times.

name: You
text: I’ll make sure to pass by more often then. It really lights up the winter nights.
